pullRequest.title: NMS-12547: Use ProtoBuf to transport BMP messages
pullRequest.bodyText:
Using a BMP-specific ProtoBuf transport format instead of BSON based
format.

JIRA (Issue Tracker): http://issues.opennms.org/browse/NMS-12547

nodes.bodyText: Should call this something other than document now?
Worth creating a JIRA for this?
